name: Rarebit Savories
author: KerriJ
summary: My mother's version of the classic - perfect for canapes at a cocktail party, and children love them!  Fast, easy and absolutely delicious.
ingredients: ½ pound aged Cheddar cheese, cubed
60 slices sandwich bread, cut into rounds
directions: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet
Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown
Place the bacon, Cheddar cheese, onion, mayonnaise, and mustard into the bowl of a food processor; process until well blended
Scoop into a container, cover, and refrigerate several hours to overnight to allow the flavors to blend
Adjust oven rack to the topmost position, and set oven to Broil
Spread the bread rounds evenly with cheese mixture and place onto a cookie sheet
Toast under the broiler until browned and puffed, 5 to 8 minutes
